â€¢ Soft Cream:      #F5F5DC - Warmth, natural background
â€¢ Medium Gray:     #757575 - Text, borders, subtle elements
â€¢ Deep Charcoal:   #212121 - Headings, emphasis, contrast
```text
### Typography Hierarchy

```text
AGRICULTURAL TYPOGRAPHY SYSTEM:

DISPLAY FONTS (Farm Impact):
â€¢ Hero Display:    48px/56px (Bold) - "Fresh From Local Farms"
â€¢ Section Header:  36px/44px (Semibold) - Major page sections
â€¢ Card Title:      24px/32px (Semibold) - Farm names, product titles

BODY FONTS (Readability):
â€¢ Body Large:      18px/28px (Regular) - Farm stories, descriptions
â€¢ Body Standard:   16px/24px (Regular) - Product details, content
â€¢ Body Small:      14px/20px (Regular) - Metadata, labels, captions
â€¢ Micro Text:      12px/16px (Regular) - Legal, timestamps, fine print

ACCESSIBILITY REQUIREMENTS:
â€¢ Minimum contrast ratio: 4.5:1 (WCAG AA)
â€¢ Font smoothing: Optimized for readability on all devices
â€¢ Line height: 1.5x for body text (enhanced readability)
â€¢ Letter spacing: Adjusted for legibility at small sizes
```text
### Spacing & Layout System

```text
8PX QUANTUM GRID (Biodynamic Rhythm):
â€¢ 4px:  Micro spacing (icon padding, tight elements)
â€¢ 8px:  Base unit (button padding, small gaps)
â€¢ 16px: Standard spacing (form fields, card padding)
â€¢ 24px: Section separation (content blocks)
â€¢ 32px: Major spacing (component margins)
â€¢ 48px: Large spacing (section dividers)
â€¢ 64px: Hero spacing (landing sections, visual breathing room)

RESPONSIVE BREAKPOINTS:
â€¢ Mobile:      320px - 768px  (80% farmer smartphone usage)
â€¢ Tablet:      769px - 1024px (Consumer browsing)
â€¢ Desktop:     1025px+         (Admin & detailed farm management)
```text

## ğŸŒŸ DIVINE AGRICULTURAL PRINCIPLES

### Core Platform Values

```text
FARMERS MARKET GUIDING PHILOSOPHY:

1. FARMER-FIRST CONSCIOUSNESS
   â€¢ Design every feature from farmer perspective
   â€¢ Minimize time investment (3-minute product listing)
   â€¢ Maximize revenue (85% payout, lowest industry commission)
   â€¢ Respect farming realities (seasonal, weather-dependent, time-constrained)

2. TRANSPARENCY & TRUST
   â€¢ Show farm practices, certifications, and stories
   â€¢ Display pricing breakdown (farm price + platform fee)
   â€¢ Enable direct farmer-consumer communication
   â€¢ Honest marketing (no exaggerated claims)

3. SUSTAINABLE SCALABILITY
   â€¢ Build for 5,000+ farms without architectural changes
   â€¢ Optimize for seasonal peak loads (harvest season traffic spikes)
   â€¢ Financial sustainability (15% commission covers operations + growth)
   â€¢ Technical debt prevention (comprehensive testing, clean code)

4. COMMUNITY EMPOWERMENT
   â€¢ Foster farmer-consumer relationships (reviews, messaging, farm visits)
   â€¢ Support local food systems (prioritize regional farms in search)
   â€¢ Educational content (farming practices, seasonal eating guides)
   â€¢ Collaborative growth (farmer feedback shapes feature roadmap)

5. MOBILE-FIRST ACCESSIBILITY
   â€¢ 80% farmers use smartphones as primary device
   â€¢ Offline capability for field use (PWA)
   â€¢ Voice input for hands-free listing creation
   â€¢ Touch-optimized UI (large buttons, clear CTAs)
